channel.title: Can't find right item list for client
channel.description:
Well just read this story :p
My friend (co-owner) couldnt go on silabsoft because he did got 'error with cache' or something we try'd to fix it but it didnt work either. So i did create a Client for him based on Richscape Client, BUT he got A LOT of nulls at shops and inventory and his banks... and i will fix that but i couldnt find right item list, i did try a lot of item lists but no one is right.
So my question = Anybody got the item / npc list of the richscape client?

item.title: Can't find right item list for client
item.dc:creator: @OMGNUGGETS OMGNUGGETS
item.description:
@OMGNUGGETS wrote:

Just tell your friend to DOWNLOAD the Silabsoft client that you run from your desktop
it has less lag and no errors. i had same problem with webclient so i got that and it works fine
Though i lost the link for it so you would have to find it yourself
GL

Read full topic
item.source: Can't find right item list for client

item.title: Can't find right item list for client
item.dc:creator: @I_kolo_I I kolo I
item.description:
@I_kolo_I wrote:

ty good idea i found it, but if i wear bandos chestplate it will equiped at weapon place, even at bandos skirt…

Read full topic

item.title: Can't find right item list for client
item.dc:creator: @Goth_Wolf Goth Wolf
item.description:
@Goth_Wolf wrote:

Download the Richscape Server Source And Open Item.cfg in the config file of the server and then wala full richscape item id’s

Read full topic
